content: the **summer slouch hat** is made with dk weight yarn light weight yarn using a 4 mm g hook for the band and a 5 mm h hook for the main part of the hat the pattern includes sizes for toddler 12 24 months small child 3 5 years child 6 10 years teen adult small adult medium and adult large for my summer slouch hati used 1 93 oz 55 g and 139 yds 127 m of dk weight yarn hat band approximately 6 single_crochet in 1 inch and 5 row per 1 inch hat body approximately \*18 sts per 4 inches and 8 row per 4 inches \*18 sts = 1 double_crochet chain 1 9 times **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
